Class Maze.MazeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • mwoo.amazingapp.Maze.MazeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, java.lang.Runnable

    Maze

    class Maze.MazeView
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements java.lang.Runnable
    How the maze is depicted.

        private int[] playerPos
        Position of the player in the maze. Index 0 is what row the player is on. Index 1 is the column the player is on.

        Tells if the game is finished.

        Holds the last place touched's x coordinate. Used in determining where the player wants to go.

        private float lastTouchedY
        Holds the last place touched's y coordinate. Used in determining where the player wants to go.

      • ActivePointerId

        private int ActivePointerId
        Used in getting the player's swipes and them dragging their fingers. Allows for multiple fingers on the screen.
